languages.text: "Радость умерла в моем сердце, эттфатер. Я чувствую лишь гнев... Хотя это ложь. Кажется, я уже больше почти ничего не чувствую. Просто хочу растерзать кого-нибудь. Скоро лишь это чувство останется во мне, а затем уйдет и оно. И я буду пуст".

"The joy in my heart is dead, Aett-Vater. I feel only rage... But that is a lie. In truth, I feel nothing at all anymore. I simply wish to tear someone asunder. Soon, that feeling will be all that is left inside me, and then even it will fade. And I will be hollow."
languages.original_text: "Радость умерла в моем сердце, эттфатер. Я чувствую лишь гнев... Хотя это ложь. Кажется, я уже больше почти ничего не чувствую. Просто хочу растерзать кого-нибудь. Скоро лишь это чувство останется во мне, а затем уйдет и оно. И я буду пуст".

languages.text: «La alegría de mi corazón está muerta, Aett-Vater. Solo siento ira... pero hasta eso es mentira. En realidad, ya no siento nada. Solo quiero despedazar a alguien. Pronto, solo quedará en mí esa sensación, que también se desvanecerá. Y quedaré hueco».
languages.original_text: "The joy in my heart is dead, Aett-Vater. I feel only rage... But that is a lie. In truth, I feel nothing at all anymore. I simply wish to tear someone asunder. Soon, that feeling will be all that is left inside me, and then even it will fade. And I will be hollow."

traits.locale_text: «La alegría de mi corazón está muerta, Aett-Vater. Solo siento ira... pero hasta eso es mentira. En realidad, ya no siento nada. Solo quiero despedazar a alguien. Pronto, solo quedará en mí esa sensación, que también se desvanecerá. Y quedaré hueco».

languages.text: “我心中的喜悦已逝，狼领。如今只剩下愤怒……但那也只是谎言罢了。事实上，我已经什么都感觉不到了。我只想把什么人撕碎。用不了多久，我的内心就会只剩下这种感觉。之后，就连这种感觉也会黯淡下去，我将空无一物。”
languages.original_text: "The joy in my heart is dead, Aett-Vater. I feel only rage... But that is a lie. In truth, I feel nothing at all anymore. I simply wish to tear someone asunder. Soon, that feeling will be all that is left inside me, and then even it will fade. And I will be hollow."

traits.locale_text: “我心中的喜悦已逝，狼领。如今只剩下愤怒……但那也只是谎言罢了。事实上，我已经什么都感觉不到了。我只想把什么人撕碎。用不了多久，我的内心就会只剩下这种感觉。之后，就连这种感觉也会黯淡下去，我将空无一物。”

languages.text: 「俺の心にあった喜びは全て死んでしまった、アエット＝ヴァテルよ。俺の中には怒りしかない…いや、それも嘘だ。実際は、もう何も感じない。とにかく誰かをバラバラに切り裂いてしまいたい。すぐにこの感情だけが俺の中に取り残されるだろう。そして、それすらもいつかは薄れゆく…やがて、俺は空っぽになるんだ」
languages.original_text: "The joy in my heart is dead, Aett-Vater. I feel only rage... But that is a lie. In truth, I feel nothing at all anymore. I simply wish to tear someone asunder. Soon, that feeling will be all that is left inside me, and then even it will fade. And I will be hollow."

traits.locale_text: 「俺の心にあった喜びは全て死んでしまった、アエット＝ヴァテルよ。俺の中には怒りしかない…いや、それも嘘だ。実際は、もう何も感じない。とにかく誰かをバラバラに切り裂いてしまいたい。すぐにこの感情だけが俺の中に取り残されるだろう。そして、それすらもいつかは薄れゆく…やがて、俺は空っぽになるんだ」

languages.text: « La joie a déserté mon cœur, aett-vater. Je n'éprouve plus que de la rage... Non, inutile de se mentir. En vérité, je ne ressens plus rien du tout. Je n'ai qu'une envie, tailler quelqu'un en pièces. Bientôt, ce sentiment m'habitera tout entier, jusqu'au jour où il finira par disparaître à son tour, ne laissant derrière lui qu'une coquille vide. »
languages.original_text: "The joy in my heart is dead, Aett-Vater. I feel only rage... But that is a lie. In truth, I feel nothing at all anymore. I simply wish to tear someone asunder. Soon, that feeling will be all that is left inside me, and then even it will fade. And I will be hollow."

traits.locale_text: « La joie a déserté mon cœur, aett-vater. Je n'éprouve plus que de la rage... Non, inutile de se mentir. En vérité, je ne ressens plus rien du tout. Bientôt, ce sentiment m'habitera tout entier, jusqu'au jour où il finira par disparaître à son tour, ne laissant derrière lui qu'une coquille vide. »

languages.text: "Die Freude in meinem Herzen ist tot, Aett-Vater. Ich empfinde nur noch Zorn ... Doch das ist gelogen. In Wahrheit empfinde ich gar nichts mehr. Ich möchte nur jemanden in Stücke reißen. Bald ist dieses Gefühl alles, was in mir noch existiert, und dann wird es ebenfalls verblassen. Und ich werde hohl und leer sein."
languages.original_text: "The joy in my heart is dead, Aett-Vater. I feel only rage... But that is a lie. In truth, I feel nothing at all anymore. I simply wish to tear someone asunder. Soon, that feeling will be all that is left inside me, and then even it will fade. And I will be hollow."

languages.original_text: "The joy in my heart is dead, Aett-Vater. I feel only rage... But that is a lie. In truth, I feel nothing at all anymore. I simply wish to tear someone asunder. Soon, that feeling will be all that is left inside me, and then even it will fade. And I will be hollow."

languages.text: "Kalbimdeki neşe artık yok Aett-Vater. Sadece öfke hissediyorum. Hayır, yalan söylüyorum. Artık hiçbir şey hissetmiyorum. Sadece birilerini paramparça etmek istiyorum. Yakında içimde kalan tek his bu olacak, sonra o da yitip gidecek. Bomboş kalacağım."
languages.original_text: "The joy in my heart is dead, Aett-Vater. I feel only rage... But that is a lie. In truth, I feel nothing at all anymore. I simply wish to tear someone asunder. Soon, that feeling will be all that is left inside me, and then even it will fade. And I will be hollow."
